movie-description: In this suspenseful thriller, Joanna Kendall must choose between right and wrong when she accidentally hits a young girl with her car. After leaving to call for help, she returns - only to hear the reaction of horrified onlookers, who are outraged that the culprit left the scene of the crime. In a moment of panic and confusion, Joanna makes the life-changing decision to remain silent. The effect snowballs, as this perfect wife and mother must grapple with her guilt, as well as with the female detective who suspects her.
movie-short-description: Directed by Dan Lerner.  With Margaret Colin, Lisa Vidal, Drew Pillsbury, Allison Gregory. A woman struggles with guilt after fleeing from the scene of an accident.
